title: Ghost crab
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all arthropods, see [list of arthropods](/List_of_arthropods "List of arthropods").*

| ghost crab t [![Ghost crab.png](/images/1/1a/Ghost_crab.png)](/File:Ghost_crab.png) |                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                      | 38-78                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                          | 9                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                      | 948                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                             | 10                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                  | 9                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                            | 6                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                      | 40                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Attack1                                                                             | 20 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [drain experience](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                           |
| Attack2                                                                             | 15 ([claw](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [drain experience](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                           |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                             | [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                   | [Holy](/Holy "Holy")                                                                                                                                                    |

| Flags                                                                               | [Evil](/Evil "Evil") [Unbreathing](/Unbreathing "Unbreathing") [No skeleton](/No_skeleton "No skeleton") [No zombie](/Category:No_zombie "Category:No zombie")          |

|   |                                                                                                                                           |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A close relative of the fire crab, twisted by proximity to negative energy. Apparitions of the dead swirl around it, only barely visible. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Ghost crabs** are aggravating amphibious opponents which flood the battlefield with spectral mist clouds, damaging non-undead targets and summoning [branch](/Branch "Branch")-appropriate [spectral things](/Spectral_thing "Spectral thing") to assault you. They are durable enough to take a hit or two, and inflict [draining](/Draining "Draining") with their melee attacks, but more often than not simply blast you from the back row while their summons tear you apart. They can be found in [the Swamp](/The_Swamp "The Swamp").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                    |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Spectral Cloud](/Spectral_Cloud "Spectral Cloud") | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Laying down your own clouds will prevent a ghost crab from filling those tiles with spectral mist. A [scroll of fog](/Scroll_of_fog "Scroll of fog") is your safest bet, and it's easy to lure the thing into your cloud bank so you can take it out at close range. If you have [poison](/Poison "Poison") resistance, [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud") also works, and doesn't require using a consumable.
- Ghost crabs have relatively low [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"), which makes them good targets for [hex](/Hex "Hex") spells and [wands](/Wands "Wands").

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), it was possible to create [derived undead](/Derived_undead "Derived undead") from ghost crabs.
- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), ghost crabs had multi-[holiness](/Holiness "Holiness") ([Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness") and [Undead](/Category:Undead_holiness "Category:Undead holiness")). They weren't susceptible to weapons of [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") or [Dispel Undead](/Dispel_Undead "Dispel Undead") and also were vulnerable to [poison](/Poison "Poison").
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), their [spectral mist](/Spectral_Cloud "Spectral Cloud") could heal all [undead](/Undead "Undead"), including undead players.
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), ghost crabs weren't [amphibious](/Amphibious "Amphibious") and weren't resistant to [rotting](/Rotting "Rotting").
html:
Ghost crab

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

ghost crab t 
HP 38-78
HD 9
XP 948
Speed 10
AC 9
EV 6
Will 40
Attack1 20 (bite: drain experience)
Attack2 15 (claw: drain experience)


Resistances rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Amphibious
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Undead
Size Small
Type crab, ghost crab
Flags Evil
Unbreathing
No skeleton
No zombie
A close relative of the fire crab, twisted by proximity to negative energy. Apparitions of the dead swirl around it, only barely visible.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Ghost crabs are aggravating amphibious opponents which flood the battlefield with spectral mist clouds, damaging non-undead targets and summoning branch-appropriate spectral things to assault you. They are durable enough to take a hit or two, and inflict draining with their melee attacks, but more often than not simply blast you from the back row while their summons tear you apart. They can be found in the Swamp.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Spectral Cloud Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Laying down your own clouds will prevent a ghost crab from filling those tiles with spectral mist. A scroll of fog is your safest bet, and it's easy to lure the thing into your cloud bank so you can take it out at close range. If you have poison resistance, Mephitic Cloud also works, and doesn't require using a consumable.
  • Ghost crabs have relatively low willpower, which makes them good targets for hex spells and wands.

History

  • Prior to 0.31, it was possible to create derived undead from ghost crabs.
  • Prior to 0.20, ghost crabs had multi-holiness (Natural and Undead). They weren't susceptible to weapons of holy wrath or Dispel Undead and also were vulnerable to poison.
  • Prior to 0.19, their spectral mist could heal all undead, including undead players.
  • Prior to 0.16, ghost crabs weren't amphibious and weren't resistant to rotting.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Ghost_crab&oldid=78768"

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{list of | arthropods}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Ghost crabs''' are aggravating amphibious opponents which flood the battlefield with spectral mist clouds, damaging non-undead targets and summoning [[branch]]-appropriate [[spectral thing]]s to assault you. They are durable enough to take a hit or two, and inflict [[draining]] with their melee attacks, but more often than not simply blast you from the back row while their summons tear you apart. They can be found in [[the Swamp]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Laying down your own clouds will prevent a ghost crab from filling those tiles with spectral mist. A [[scroll of fog]] is your safest bet, and it's easy to lure the thing into your cloud bank so you can take it out at close range. If you have [[poison]] resistance, [[Mephitic Cloud]] also works, and doesn't require using a consumable.
*Ghost crabs have relatively low [[willpower]], which makes them good targets for [[hex]] spells and [[wands]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], it was possible to create [[derived undead]] from ghost crabs.
*Prior to [[0.20]], ghost crabs had multi-[[holiness]] ([[:Category:Natural_holiness|Natural]] and [[:Category:Undead_holiness|Undead]]). They weren't susceptible to weapons of [[holy wrath]] or [[Dispel Undead]] and also were vulnerable to [[poison]].
*Prior to [[0.19]], their [[Spectral Cloud|spectral mist]] could heal all [[undead]], including undead players.
*Prior to [[0.16]], ghost crabs weren't [[amphibious]] and weren't resistant to [[rotting]].
